title: Queue dodgers
body:
I am wondering when dodgers in games will start to get a longer penalty than is in currently in place now.

It needs to be a 1 day penalty first offence, might teach the kids not to dodge games.

replies.body:
yeah that's totally fair. someone's gonna troll? I didn't want to play for 24 hours anyway.
no, it's fine how it is.
Let me guess, your that one guy that always trolls and can never get a game because of it?
Yeah or he's one of those "mid or feed" douchebags who ends up feeding mid anyways.

ok cool today I had to dodge because i was in q and i sed top first joined game first all see that i sed top but 3of5 were pre made with me and a mate as the other 2 now these dicks went top mid and jg i cant adc or sup for shit and they  all insta locked now what your saying is that i have to wait 24 hours because of 3 dicks  and i cant adc or sup so you wont me to adc or sup and feed and not be good in lane are you a retard or some shit

Why is it such a big deal if you dodge a champ select anyway?
At lest you didn't dc in game.

the thing i hate most is when you are in a promo series which you get queued with trolls and you cant leave with out getting an automatic loss to the series... let alone having to be "nice" to said troll for the rest of the game while you lose anyway.

This will never happen. Originally in ranked you would lose elo when you dodged (season one it really hurt to dodge in ranked)
24 hours is insane. Things come up sometimes and sometimes people get grouped with people who are trolls.

No. Sure, it's annoying when you waste an extra 5-10 minutes in queues sometimes, but dodging is an important mechanism for coping with ragers, trolls and more. I think there could be a harsher penalty for chronic dodgers (e.g. if you dodge more than 7 times in a week you should receive double-time penalties) but outside of that I'm happy to deal with an occasional dodger if it means higher quality games.
